Entry.Name: Invalid Server Certificate
Entry.Description: This app does not validate SSL Certificates. It permits the use of self-signed, expired, or mismatched CN certificates for SSL connections. This represents a critical vulnerability, enabling attackers to carry out Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks undetected.

Mitigation.Textual:
Please remove the vulnerable code. Avoid attempting to instantiate a X509Certificate and override checkClientTrusted, checkServerTrusted, and getAcceptedIssuers methods with empty implementations.
It's recommended to stick with the existing API instead of coming up with your own X509Certificate class. You can find an example of implementation here
